summary: Adds all of the werewolf perks :)
descriptionHtml:
THIS SIMPLY UNLOCKS ALL OF THE WEREWOLF PERKS IN SKYRIM THAT WERE ADDED IN WITH DAWNGUARD. REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.

[Dawnguard must be at the top of the data files list in your skyrim launcher. Open skyrim > data files > click dawnguard > keep clicking the up arrow until it gets to the top > enjoy! :]

Copy werewolf.txt into the /data folder of skyrim.

In game ENTER BEAST FORM FIRST
then open the console and type \"bat werewolf\", exit the console and press tab and viola ! Enjoy Dawnguard :)
author: SONNYSPAK
